name: Stella Devita
description:
This game is compatible with mobile! Try it out on your phone!

Stella Devita has been made for the MiniJam#75 with the limitation: Weight must be a mechanic. Play as a cute little spaceship and avoid crashes!

This game is an infinite runner, share your highscore in the comments! Mine (Avace) is 278,409.

Credits

2D Art - DeathBiscuitt
Programming - Avace

What we did not make ourselves:
  • Musics: Humble Bundle Big Music 2
  • Sounds:
    • Voices: Super Dialogue Pack by bckr on Itch.io
    • Repair sound: Heal from Spell Sounds Starter Pack from OpenGameArt by p0ss
    • Explosions:
      • High Quality Explosions from OpenGameArt by qubodup
      • Rockbreaking from OpenGameArt by Lamoot
    • Ship sound: Flamethrower from Spell Sounds Starter Pack from OpenGameArt by p0ss
